item.title: The journal of debug lightty access log not appending
item.description: What I learned Why O_APPEND is needed: multiple process write the same file O_APPEND Before each write(2), the file offset is positioned at the end of the file, as if with lseek(2). The modification of the file offset and the write operation are performed as a single atomic step. fcntl(fd, F_SETFL, O_NONBLOCK); It will clear all file status flags firstly. UML: user mode linux With it, we could GDB linux
